title: 6.2 Master Challenge 3
question:
Using the safe drinking water dataset carry out the following actions:
1. Ask the user to select any one option from below:
(i) Create a stacked bar graph.
(ii) Create a stacked horizontal bar graph.
2. Consider the details of all the countries other than Asian countries.
3. To it, assign the title Drinking Water Analysis of Non-Asian Countries.
4. The parameters that are to be compared can be obtained as input from the user.
5. Display the bar graph.

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
